title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Express strong emotions in a direct manner, whether it's exercising vigorously, performing a physical chore, or simply telling the truth. Unresolved feelings can boil to the surface. Maybe you havent received the compensation or respect you believe you deserve. Or you might be frustrated with your own languishing efforts to get a project off the ground. The truth is unacknowledged resentment can morph into passive-aggressive behavior or even depression. Use anger as a powerful tool toward progress, not as a chain to bind you down. Deepak Chopra wrote, All great changes are preceded by chaos. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
